section.title: Changes that need to be done at the time of the switch
section.para: This section outlines porting tasks that you need to tackle when you get to the point that you actually build your application against Handy 1. Making it possible to prepare for these in Handy 0.0 would have been either impossible or impractical.

section.title: Stop using HdyLeafletModeTransitionType and HdyLeafletChildTransitionType
section.para: The HdyLeafletModeTransitionType and HdyLeafletChildTransitionType types have been merged into Handy 1. Use HdyLeafletTransitionType instead.
